Gandi, my DNS hoster is having an event where they give out stuff for free because of their 15th anniversary:
https://15.gandi.net/

I got a free *.xyz domain for a year,
Maybe someone can put it to good use:
G15XYZ-378F-57B4-B71D

I thought about buying root-a.xyz but then said maybe someone has a better use.

posts.message:
"The International Space Apps Challenge is a two-day hackathon where teams of technologists, scientists, designers, artists, educators, entrepreneurs, developers and students across the globe collaborate and engage with publicly available data to design innovative solutions for global challenges."

The NASA Space Apps Hackathon has been running for 2-3 years now. This year it will run in 111 locations throughout the globe with the first time participation by Egypt. It will be on the 11th and 12th of April this year (Saturday and Sunday) before Shamm Nessim.

Website for the 2015 Hackathon: https://2015.spaceappschallenge.org/,

The 2015 Hackathon is divided into the following categories:

1. Outer Space

2. Human

3. Earth

4. Robotics

Programming projects are proposed by NASA under these categories and participants can come up with their own idea if they want to. 

There are also couple of ideas related to wearables and 3D printer in the other tracks.

Participants come from various backgrounds; scientists, entrepreneurs, data analysis experts, developers, designers...etc. There is no age limit or bracket. Last year there were participants from 16 years old to 6x.

Interested participants can register at:
https://2015.spaceappschallenge.org/location/cairo-waitlist/

They can make a team and associate with a challenge:
http://spaceappscairo.com/teamsForm.html

They are welcome to join the particpants facebook group at:
https://www.facebook.com/groups/spaceappscairo/
posts.caption: 2015.spaceappschallenge.org
posts.description: The International Space Apps Challenge is a two-day hackathon where teams of technologists, scientists, designers, artists, educators, entrepreneurs, developers and students across the globe collaborate and engage with publicly available data to design innovative solutions for global challenges.
